name: Quest For Oasis
description:
Talk with NPCs to find your way towards the Oasis, before dry out  to death! Beware the Sand Raiders and other mysterious dangers of the Barrenlands!

Game and assets entirely made by me (Ponzalskov).

Music and sound effects mixed and made in FL Studio.
Game programmed in GMS2.

Sprites made and edited with Aseprite, Juice FX, and Pixel FX Designer.

First finished game submitted to a Jam, hope you enjoy it ! :D
